byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Qualcomm is working on deal to buy chip-maker NXP Semiconductors for more than $30 billion.

headline.print_headline: Qualcomm Said to Be in Talks to Buy NXP in Deal Potentially Worth $30 Billion
headline.main: Qualcomm Is Said to Be in Talks to Buy NXP Semiconductors

snippet: A merger of the two companies would be the latest consolidation in the chip-making industry and could be valued at over $30 billion....
lead_paragraph: A merger of the two companies would be the latest consolidation in the chip-making industry and could be valued at over $30 billion.
